member.name: T:ZXing.OpenCV.BarcodeReader
member.summary: a barcode reader class which can be used with the Mat type from OpenCVSharp

member.name: F:ZXing.OpenCV.BarcodeReader.defaultCreateLuminanceSource
member.summary: define a custom function for creation of a luminance source with our specialized Mat-supporting class

member.summary: constructor which uses a custom luminance source with Mat support

member.name: T:ZXing.OpenCV.MatLuminanceSource
member.summary: A luminance source class which consumes a Mat image from OpenCVSharp and calculates the luminance values based on the bytes of the image

member.name: M:ZXing.OpenCV.MatLuminanceSource.CreateLuminanceSource(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Should create a new luminance source with the right class type. The method is used in methods crop and rotate.

member.summary: extensions methods which are working directly on any IBarcodeReaderGeneric implementation

member.summary: uses the IBarcodeReaderGeneric implementation and the class for decoding
